report.title: Species & Occurrence Counts by Taxon Group name site filter
report.description: Lists taxon groups for a named site and the number of recorded species and occurrences within them. Optional date range and survey filters.
report.query: SELECT cttl.taxon_group as taxongroup, count(DISTINCT o.taxon_meaning_id) as species_count, count(DISTINCT o.id) as occurrences_count, #website_id# as website_id FROM cache_occurrences_functional o JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl ON cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional snf ON snf.id=o.sample_id AND length(snf.public_entered_sref)>6 JOIN (locations l JOIN locations_websites lw ON lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.website_id=#website_id# AND lw.deleted=false ) on l.name='#site_name#' AND st_intersects(l.boundary_geom, o.public_geom) AND l.deleted=false WHERE o.website_id=#website_id# AND o.record_status<>'R' AND (CAST(o.survey_id AS character varying)='#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='') AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR o.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR o.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) GROUP BY taxongroup UNION SELECT 'Total' as taxongroup, count(DISTINCT o.taxon_meaning_id) as species_count, count(DISTINCT o.id) as occurrences_count, #website_id# as website_id FROM cache_occurrences_functional o JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional snf ON snf.id=o.sample_id AND length(snf.public_entered_sref)>6 JOIN (locations l JOIN locations_websites lw ON lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.website_id=#website_id# AND lw.deleted=false ) on l.name='#site_name#' AND st_intersects(l.boundary_geom, o.public_geom) AND l.deleted=false WHERE o.website_id=#website_id# AND o.record_status<>'R' AND (CAST(o.survey_id AS character varying)='#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='') AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR o.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR o.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND '#include_total#'!='no'

param.name: website_id
param.description: Select the website to return data for

param.name: site_name
param.description: Enter the exact name of the site to search.

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for, or leave for all surveys
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys
